meta.job_title: Travel Nurse RN PCU - Progressive Care Unit

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive patient care in the Progressive Care Unit, monitoring and addressing critical conditions and medical needs.
Collaborate with medical team to ensure effective treatment plans and medication management for patients in PCU.
Implement healthcare informatics solutions to document patient information and ensure accurate record-keeping.
Communicate and collaborate with multi-disciplinary healthcare teams to provide holistic and patient-centered care.
Adhere to healthcare best practices and policies to maintain high-quality patient care and safety standards.
